```{r rearange}
# selecting columns I actually want

  select("QN2", "QN3", "QN6", "QN9", "QN10", "QN17", "QN18", "QN19", "QN22", "QN25", "QN26",  "QN31", "QN32", "QN33", "QN82", "QN61", "QN63", "QN93", "QN102", "QN98")

#renaming said columns

  rename(
    "Gender" = QN2 
  )
```
